path: Boxes/Temple College Nursing Program/LVN Program/Spring 25/Med-Surg III/Documents/Module II - Resp Electrolyte/ABG's at a Glance.pdf
text: VN Program- ABG at A Glance Step 1: What is the pH level? __________________ Or Alkalosis Acidosis Step 2: Is the patients PCO2 within normal range? Yes= move to step 3 No= Respiratory Step 3: is the patients HCO3 level within normal range? Yes= look back to step 2 No= Metabolic Examples: Normal Values pH- 7.35-7.45 PCO2- 32-45 HCO3- 20-26 pH- 7.47 PCO2- 30 HCO3- 21 ___Respiratory Alkalosis________ pH- 7.30 PCO2- 34 HCO3- 27 ___Metabolic Acidosis ________
